attributes.action: We need to make our alcohol legal to sell after 10pm in Scotland
attributes.background: Make alcohol legal to sell in shops after 10 pm

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament once the current election has concluded, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
